DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect acute intake three different type strawberry jam , differ carbohydrate antioxidant content , postprandial glucose metabolism , lipid profile , antioxidant status satiety index , healthy adult .
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : Randomized , postprandial , crossover , double-blind intervention three arm . Subjects : Sixteen healthy adult Product study : At arm , participant consume 60g strawberry jam : - High-sugar jam ( traditional ; HS ) , - Low-sugar jam ( without added-sugar ; LS ) , - Low-sugar jam include antioxidant extract strawberry pulp ( LSA ) .
DOC.criteria: Adult men woman Normal weight overweight ( BMI 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 ) Age 20 50 year old . To suffer chronic disease related metabolism , To follow concomitant medication , To follow slimming treatment hormone replacement therapy , To inability perform followup , Smoking , Known food allergy , Pregnancy , lactation menopause
